metadata.title: CVE-2021-30761 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in iOS 12.5.4. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a reportthat this issue may have been actively exploited..

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30761` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.26.1-3
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.26.1-3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
